author: fabiocos
body:
#### PR description:

This PR adds a test to ```Geometry/MTDGeometryBuilder``` to compare the ideal positions of BTL crystals with the reconstructed positions through ```MTDGeometry``` and ```RectangularMTDTopology```. In case of anomalous differences (a tolerance is defined in the test) a message is written in the output of the unit test, causing it to fail.

A minor code cleaning is added in the BTL digitization as well, no change is implied.

#### PR validation:

The test runs, provide the expected output, and the standard unit test succeeds with a tolerance defined at 0.5 microns for the difference between ideal and reconstructed positions (differences are below 250 nm).
title: MTD geometry: add test and unit test to probe the BTL pixel structure provided by RectanbgularMTDTopology
